Question.Subject: What should I name my blog?
Question.Content:
I am going to start a blog and I am looking for a catchy title. The blog is mainly for family and friends, and will consist of my musings, book and movie reviews, details from vacations, and well.. just anything that I feel I need to blog about.
Can you guys provides me with some suggestions of a catchy title to help me get going?
Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Running at the Mouth My Life, So Far Reflections of Somebody, Somewhere My Pursuit of Happiness My Journey from there to here Expressions of My Ups and Downs Tales from my so called Life
Titles that relate to the blog content, usually. Since no information was provided regarding that, here are some blog posts that will help you figure out some options. You would be the best source for coming up with a blog title:
"How to Name Your Blog" http://www.problogger.net/archives/2005/…
"How to Choose a Blog Name" http://www.dailyblogtips.com/how-to-choo…
"Choosing the Domain Name for Your Blog" http://www.problogger.net/archives/2006/…
"Blog Names and Domain Extensions" http://www.dailyblogtips.com/blog-names-…
"How to Choose a Domain Name - Brandable Domains vs Keyword Rich Domains" http://www.problogger.net/archives/2008/…

Answer.Content: The title of your blog should be, "I Can't Think Of A Catchy Title For My Blog". :)

Running at the Mouth My Life, So Far Reflections of Somebody, Somewhere My Pursuit of Happiness My Journey from there to here Expressions of My Ups and Downs Tales from my so called Life
Titles that relate to the blog content, usually. Since no information was provided regarding that, here are some blog posts that will help you figure out some options. You would be the best source for coming up with a blog title:
